subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: The Stanley Cup champion Blackhawks dealt the playoff star Dustin Byfuglien, along with defenseman Brent Sopel and forward Ben Eager, to the Atlanta Thrashers.
snippet: The Stanley Cup champion Blackhawks dealt the playoff star Dustin Byfuglien, along with defenseman Brent Sopel and forward Ben Eager, to the Atlanta Thrashers.
